section.name: s2
section.heading: Designation of places
section.content: The places specified in the Schedule are designated as designated places for the purposes of section 13A of the Ordinance.

section.name: s1
section.content: The sites and buildings from time to time set apart for the purposes of prisons under the Prisons Ordinance (Cap. 234) and which are specified in the Schedule to the Prisons Order (Cap. 234 sub. leg. B).

section.name: s3
section.content: Custodial wards of the Queen Mary Hospital and Queen Elizabeth Hospital.

section.name: s5
section.content: The area within the Hong Kong International Airport that is set aside as detention quarters for use by the Immigration Department. (L.N. 40 of 2024)

section.name: s7
section.content: The area of the Hong Kong-Macau Ferry Terminal occupied by the Immigration Department set aside as a detention room.

section.name: s8
section.content: The area of the first floor of the China Ferry Terminal, Canton Road, Tsimshatsui occupied by the Immigration Department set aside as detention quarters.

section.name: s9
section.content: The area of the 2nd floor, Central Government Pier, Road D3, New Central Reclamation Area, Central, occupied by the Immigration Department set aside as a detention room.

section.name: s11
section.content: The area set aside as a detention room in the part of the River Trade Terminal, Tuen Mun, occupied by the Immigration Department. (L.N. 325 of 1998)

section.name: s13
section.content: The area within the Lok Ma Chau Spur Line Control Point that is set aside as detention quarters for use by the Immigration Department. (L.N. 71 of 2007)

section.name: s14
section.content: The area within the Clearance Area of the Shenzhen Bay Port Hong Kong Port Area that is set aside as detention quarters for use by the Immigration Department. (L.N. 73 of 2007)

section.name: s14
section.content: The area within the Kai Tak Cruise Terminal that is set aside as detention quarters for use by the Immigration Department. (19 of 2016 s. 28)

section.name: s16
section.content: The area within the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Port that is set aside as detention quarters for use by the Immigration Department. (L.N. 161 of 2017)

section.name: s17
section.content: The area within the West Kowloon Station of the Guangzhou-Shenzhen-Hong Kong Express Rail Link (other than the West Kowloon Station Mainland Port Area) that is set aside as detention quarters for use by the Immigration Department. (L.N. 110 of 2018)

section.name: s17

section.name: s17
section.content: The detention centre at 2nd floor of the Enforcement Tower of the Immigration Headquarters, 61 Po Yap Road, Tseung Kwan O. (L.N. 40 of 2024)
